code: import React from'react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import{Formik,Form,Field}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';import{showNotification}from'utils/notifications';import GradientButton from'components/Common/gradient-button';import Players from'../partials/players';export default function AdminKick(){async function kickPlayer(player,reason){await rpc.callServer('Admin-Kick',[player,reason]);showNotification('success','Гравець кікнути');}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"admin_kick"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{reason:'',player:''},validationSchema:Yup.object({reason:Yup.string().required().min(1).max(1000),player:Yup.string().required()}),onSubmit:values=>kickPlayer(values.player,values.reason)},formik=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Field,{className:"admin_field",type:"text",name:"reason",placeholder:"\u043F\u0440\u0438\u0447\u0438\u043D\u0430"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Players,{onChange:data=>formik.setFieldValue('player',data.dbId)}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(GradientButton,{type:"submit"},"\u041A\u0456\u043A\u043D\u0443\u0442\u0438"))));}
